author: IGN
title: Jeremy Allen White's blue eyes are GONE in Springsteen: Deliver Me from Nowhere. #music #movie #ign

author: IGN
description: Wuchang: Fallen Feathers sets itself apart from the jump with its unique art and setting. It takes place in the land of Shu during the latter part of the Ming Dynasty. That single choice sets what I played of Wuchang apart from just about every other soulslike. Previewed by Will Borger
title: Wuchang Fallen Feathers Is a Soulslike with a Unique Look and a Neat Hook

author: IGN
description:
Goblin Cleanup will be available in Early Access on Steam on August 28, 2025. Watch the latest Goblin Cleanup trailer for this co-op sim game to see gameplay as dungeons get a good cleaning. Have you ever wondered what happens after completing a dungeon, how it is restarted or, better yet, who is in charge of doing it? In Goblin Cleanup, you assume the role of a professional cleaner hired by the dungeon manager to clean and prepare the dungeon for the next adventure. You can perform this task alone or with up to three companions, cooperatively or maybe not so cooperatively!

#IGN #Gaming
title: Goblin Cleanup - Official Early Access Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description: #ignsummerofgaming
title: Pauline's singing can make Donkey Kong TRANSFORM! #dk #donkeykongbananza #pauline #gameplay #ign

author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
In today's Donkey Kong Bananza-centric Nintendo Direct, the company has confirmed that Pauline is indeed in the game, and is playable via a two-player co-op mode. Interestingly, this is a younger version of Pauline than we've seen in 2017's Super Mario Odyssey (where she sang her now-famous "Jump Up, Superstar" as Mayor of New Donk City), or even her first appearance in the original Donkey Kong back in 1981. So does that make Bananza a prequel? Other details dropped in the Direct include returning Donkey Kong Country characters, DK's new powers, and more. In other news, Bungie's Marathon has been delayed again, this time to an unspecified date. Bungie is taking feedback from April's test to heart, while publisher Sony is eager to not make the same mistakes Concord did, which died a quick death within two weeks of its launch. And finally, Civil War director and 28 Years Later writer Alex Garland is on his seventh playthrough of FromSoftware's Elden Ring. Speaking
title: Nintendo Reveals Donkey Kong Bananza's Surprising Sidekick - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description: Don't miss the Bruno Mars Collaboration Trailer for Fortnite, the hit battle royale shooter developed by Epic Games. Players can soon access the hit GRAMMY-winning megastar Bruno Mars as the next Fortnite Festival Icon. A new World Tour Bundle is also available with the Bruno-San Outfit, Bruno's Collection Back Bling, and more items. Fans can also catch Bruno Mars in Fortnite Festival with the Season 9 Music Pass featuring the Die With A Smile Bruno Outfit based on the music video for “Die With A Smile”. Bruno Mars is available now in Fortnite.
title: Fortnite x Bruno Mars - Official Collaboration Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Dive into the depths and check out the unsettling Still Wakes the Deep: Siren’s Rest launch trailer for this expansion for the narrative horror game. Still Wakes the Deep: Siren’s Rest is available now on Steam, Xbox via PC and Series X|S, Epic Games Store, and PlayStation 5 (PS5).

Set over a decade after the events of Still Wakes the Deep, Siren’s Rest follows a diving crew as they explore the wreck of the Beira D oil rig, using a crowbar, cutting torch, and camera to unearth the final moments of the crew. Featuring an original story led by an all-new cast, Siren’s Rest is a chance to see the Beira D tragedy in a new light, and discover what still lurks in the darkness...
title: Still Wakes the Deep: Siren’s Rest - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description: Watch the latest Pokemon TCG Pocket trailer to see what's coming with the Eevee Grove expansion, which spotlights Eevee and its evolutions. Pokemon TCG Pocket is available for iOS and Android, and the Pokemon TCG Pocket: Evee Grove expansion will be available on June 26, 2025.
title: Pokemon TCG Pocket: Eevee Grove - Official Trailer

author: IGN
description:
The NVC crew goes bananas with Nintendo's Donkey Kong Bananza Direct! Join Logan, Brian, Reb and Seth as they break down all the biggest reveals from DK's shocking new abilities to the surprising Pauline transformation. From Turf Surfing mechanics to three unique Bananza transformations (Kong, Zebra and Ostrich modes), this might be Donkey Kong's most ambitious adventure yet. The team discusses the Splatoon-inspired Void Company villains, innovative co-op gameplay featuring Pauline's vocal attacks, and all the nostalgic callbacks to classic minecart stages and the iconic DK Rap.

#IGN #Gaming #NintendoSwitch2
title: Donkey Kong’s WILDEST Game Yet? Bananza Direct Breakdown - NVC Clips

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Khazan (F) Trailer for The First Berserker: Khazan, an action-adventure RPG developed by Neople. A new variant of Khazan rises from rage soon with the upcoming Khazan (F) DLC. Players can access the Khazan (F) variant for The First Berserker: Khazan on June 26 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #Gaming
title: The First Berserker: Khazan - Official Khazan (F) Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the latest Doom: The Dark Ages trailer to see what to expect with the June 2025 PC update for the PC versions of the FPS game. The PC update adds Path Tracing support with Ray Reconstruction for select NVIDIA GPUs. The update also includes a new Benchmark Mode that lets PC gamers measure their system’s performance on a variety of settings. Doom: The Dark Ages is now available on Xbox Series X|S, PC and PlayStation 5 (PS5). The PC update is available now.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Doom: The Dark Ages - Official PC Update Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Dune: Awakening reviewed on PC by Travis Northup.

Dune: Awakening is an excellent survival MMO that captures Frank Herbet’s sci-fi world incredibly well, mostly to its advantage and occasionally to its detriment. The survival climb from dehydrated peasant to powerful warlord of Arrakis is a joy almost every step of the way, and the story and worldbuilding filled this nerd with absolute joy. There’s still plenty for Awakening to work on though, as its combat never really hits its stride, the endgame is a bit of a chaotic mess not worth the effort, and there’s quite a few technical bugs yet to be squashed, but even these rough patches felt like tiny desert mice next to the leviathan shai-huluds that are this survival game’s wonderful successes.

#IGN #Gaming #DuneAwakening
title: Dune: Awakening Review

author: IGN
description:
Whether you're a Bohemian veteran or aspiring intrepid adventurer, there's never been a better time to jump into Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 thanks to a whole lot of new content that's been added to the game for FREE, including Horse Racing, a wealth of customization options, and Hardcore Mode. Not to mention the roadmap of DLC ahead! Here's what you've been missing from Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2. 

Presented by Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2.
title: Knave's Guide to Getting Back Into Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Cinematic Announcement Trailer for Lionhearts, an upcoming open-world persistent multiplayer feudal simulation game developed by Credenzio Studios. Players will establish armies, build trade empires, and shape history itself with the choices made. Kingdoms in-game are ran by 12 players with positions from Lord to King being controlled by real players. Lionhearts is coming soon to PC with a visual demo available now.

Support the Lionhearts Kickstarter here: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/612741239/lionhearts

#IGN #Gaming
title: Lionhearts - Official Cinematic Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description: Don't miss the Mobile Announcement Trailer for Enter the Gungeon and Exit the Gungeon, two bullet hell dungeon shooters developed by Dodge Roll. Players will shoot, dodge, and loot across both games with new touch-friendly controls designed specifically for mobile devices, letting you swipe, tap, and poke your screen to conquer the depths of the Gungeon. Players can also take to the dungeons with a new playable character, The Lamb from the hit 2D roguelike Cult of the Lamb, with new abilities inspired by the game. Both Enter the Gungeon and Exit the Gungeon are coming to mobile soon for iOS and Android.
title: Enter the Gungeon and Exit the Gungeon - Official Mobile Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Open-world survival game SCUM officially launched its full 1.0 version today and is available on Steam now. Scavenge, craft, and fight your way to dominance on a prison island as you face everything from fellow prisoners to giant mechs. And yeah, it’s hard. 

Presented by Gamepires
title: SCUM - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description: Here's your look at gameplay from Vampires: Bloodlord Rising in this new trailer for the upcoming open-world action adventure game. In Vampires: Bloodlord Rising, follow the invitation of Dragos, the game’s main character, as you witness some of the options at your disposal on your way to rule the fictitious Balkan state of Sangavia. Vampires: Bloodlord Rising will launch into Steam Early Access on October 23, 2025.
title: Vampires: Bloodlord Rising - Official New Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Springsteen: Deliver Me from Nowhere trailer for the upcoming movie starring Jeremy Allen White as Bruce Springsteen. 

Springsteen: Deliver Me from Nowhere chronicles the making of Bruce Springsteen’s 1982 “Nebraska” album, a raw, haunted acoustic record that marked a pivotal time in his life and is considered one of his most enduring works.

Starring Jeremy Allen White as the Boss, the film is written for the screen and directed by Scott Cooper based on the book “Deliver Me from Nowhere” by Warren Zanes. Springsteen: Deliver Me from Nowhere also features Jeremy Strong as Springsteen’s long-time confidant and manager, Jon Landau; Paul Walter Hauser as guitar tech Mike Batlan; Stephen Graham as Springsteen’s father, Doug; Odessa Young as love interest, Faye; Gaby Hoffman as Springsteen’s mom, Adele; Marc Maron as Chuck Plotkin; and David Krumholtz as Columbia executive, Al Teller. 

The film is produced by Cooper, Ellen Goldsmith-Vein, Eric Robinson and Scott Stuber. Tra
title: Springsteen: Deliver Me from Nowhere - Official Trailer (2025) Jeremy Allen White

author: IGN
description: Get your first look at Bleak Haven, a new first-person survival horror game whose creator says is heavily inspired by the Resident Evil series as well as The Ritual. It's a story-driven, cinematic single-player experience with puzzles, weapon crafting, and brutal combat. Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3566840/Bleak_Haven/
title: Bleak Haven – Exclusive Gameplay Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Gameplay Deep Dive Trailer for Madden NFL 26, the latest addition to the American Football simulation franchise developed by EA. Players can get the rundown on the new AI-powered machine learning system trained by real play calls and game situations over nearly a decade to deliver more explosive gameplay, with new coach and player-specific traits, authentic play styles, and more. Get a closer look at new gameplay and features for Madden NFL 26, launching on August 14 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC (Steam).

#MaddenNFL26 #Gaming #IGN
title: Madden NFL 26 - Official Gameplay Deep Dive Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Donkey Kong Bananza Direct full presentation, which aired on June 18, 2025. Donkey Kong Bananza is an upcoming 3D action open-world adventure developed by Nintendo. After Donkey Kong and Pauline are stuck in the Underground World, Donkey Kong embarks on an adventure to reach salvation. 

Players can explore the world as the one and only Donkey Kong to manipulate the surroundings through the use of abilities like Tear Off, Swing, Chunk Jump, and more to destroy specific materials. Make good use of Donkey Kong’s Bananza abilities to run at increased speeds and even fly temporarily. Find Bananzian Gems across the adventure by searching closely or completing challenges that will test Donkey Kong’s abilities. 

Make use of the game’s Photo Mode to capture a variety of different shots of Donkey Kong along the journey to share with friends and family. Assist Mode is also available to offer a more streamlined and approachable way for anyone to enjoy Donkey Kong Bananza. The game wil
title: Donkey Kong Banaza Direct 06.18.2025 - Full Presentation

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the latest trailer for Marvel Studios’ Thunderbolts, the latest cinematic installment of the MCU distributed by Marvel Studios. This unlikely band of misfits from all walks of superhero life converges into one cohesive team through the power of true human connection, solidifying them into a true team. Marvel Studios’ Thunderbolts is releasing on Digital on July 1 and Blu-Ray on July 29.

Marvel Studios’ Thunderbolts stars Florence Pugh, Sebastian Stan, Wyatt Russell, Olga Kurylenko, Lewis Pullman, Geraldine Viswanathan, Chris Bauer, Wendell Pierce, with David Harbour, with Hannah John-Kamen, and Julia Louis-Dreyfus.

In Thunderbolts, Marvel Studios assembles an unconventional team of antiheroes—Yelena Belova, Bucky Barnes, Red Guardian, Ghost, Taskmaster and John Walker. After finding themselves ensnared in a death trap set by Valentina Allegra de Fontaine, these disillusioned castoffs must embark on a dangerous mission that will force them to confront the darkest corne
title: Marvel Studios' Thunderbolts - Official 'Digital and Blu-Ray' Release Date Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description: Watch the Announcement Trailer for Goosebumps: Terror in Little Creek, an original stealth-adventure game based on the hit book series developed by PHL Collective. Players will embody Sloane Spencer in a town full of frights and plenty of dark forces that need to be uncovered from the shadows. Solve puzzles, navigate demented locations, and shape the fate of Sloane and her friends. Goosebumps: Terror in Little Creek is launching on August 29 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).
title: Goosebumps: Terror in Little Creek - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description: With Borderlands 4, the team at Gearbox seems eager to take some big swings in hopes of reclaiming the throne of firearms and shell casings they themselves built, and whether it’s the greatly improved shooting mechanics, an interesting revamp to RPG mechanics, an entirely fresh setting, a slew of new characters, or a more grounded tone in its story, the handful of hours I played left me fairly confident that I will find myself pulled back into this wonderfully weird world of psychopaths and extremely irritating robots. Previewed by Travis Northup
title: Borderlands 4 Sets Its Sights on Reclaiming the Looter Shooter Throne

author: IGN
description: Here's your look at the Tsarevna teaser trailer for this upcoming third-person action slasher game that combines precise sword combat with the elegance of classical ballet, set in a dark fantasy world shaped by Slavic folklore. Take on the role of the Tsarevna, a young warrior and heir to a fallen dynasty. Armed with a magical blade forged from emotion itself, she battles through hordes of creatures drawn from myth — wraiths, mermaids, forest spirits — as she seeks vengeance and truth in a world scarred by a long-forgotten cataclysm. Tsarevna will be available on PC via Steam in 2026.
title: Tsarevna - Official Teaser Trailer

author: IGN
description: Awita: Journey of Hope is available now on PC via Steam. Watch the Awita: Journey of Hope launch trailer for this side-scrolling metroidvania game that follows the remarkable journey of a courageous girl determined to rescue her village from the clutches of a devastating epidemic. The new Awita: Journey of Hope trailer shows gameplay and more.
title: Awita: Journey of Hope - Official Launch Trailer
